item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! My name is Bruce. I have concentrated my studies around economics, accounting, and finance while at the University of Toronto and have managed to also obtain an accounting designation. My current focus is on integrating various data science concepts into classical financial analysis and modelling. I intend to use this website as a medium to collect, write, and share my adventures in data science. I am an avid R user, and also like to cycle when the sun is out :).
